meanings.definition: A condition in which the foreskin of the penis is too tight to be pulled back over the head.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the boy with phimosis, explaining that his foreskin was too tight.
meanings.sent2: Phimosis can cause discomfort and difficulty during urination.
meanings.sent3: The phimosis made it challenging for the boy to clean properly.
meanings.sent4: His phimosis was like a stubborn cap that refused to come off.
meanings.sent5: The phimosis was a barrier to his normal bodily functions.

meanings.definition: A narrowing of the opening of the foreskin so that it cannot be retracted.
meanings.sent1: The phimosis prevented the foreskin from retracting fully.
meanings.sent2: Severe phimosis may require medical intervention to correct.
meanings.sent3: The phimosis seemed to have a mind of its own, resisting any attempts to retract.
meanings.sent4: His phimosis was like a locked gate, keeping everything inside.
meanings.sent5: The tight phimosis caused discomfort and restricted movement.
